name: ResearchSubjectStateType
title: ResearchSubjectStateType
description: Identifies the kind of state being refered to.

concept.definition: One of a set of milestone events that once they have occurred remain true thereafter.  For example once a subject has reached the "Signed Informed Consent" milestone they achieve a status of "Consented" that will be true thereafter, even when they have left the study.  For a subject a number of these states can be simulataneously true and should be recorded.
This is a status that can only have a single value at a given point in time.  The subject is either on-study or off-study.
